C_Cpp.clang_format_fallbackStyle: {BasedOnStyle: LLVM, IndentWidth: 2, ColumnLimit: 120, AlignEscapedNewlines: Left, AllowShortEnumsOnASingleLine: false, AllowShortFunctionsOnASingleLine: None, AllowShortLambdasOnASingleLine: None, BreakBeforeBinaryOperators: NonAssignment, BreakConstructorInitializers: AfterColon, BreakInheritanceList: AfterComma, BreakStringLiterals: false, BreakTemplateDeclarations: Yes, ConstructorInitializerIndentWidth: 2, ContinuationIndentWidth: 2, IndentExternBlock: Indent, IndentPPDirectives: AfterHash, InsertBraces: true, JavaScriptQuotes: Double, MaxEmptyLinesToKeep: 2, NamespaceIndentation: All, SortIncludes: Never, SpaceAfterTemplateKeyword: false, SpacesInContainerLiterals: false}
